author: felixweber
title: LATAM Town Hall by Catalyst Swarm
description: Latin America does not have an adequate and frictionless entry point to the Cardano and Catalyst Communities
solution: LATAM Townhall offers a place for local communities to meet and connect in their languages, providing a fast and safe onboarding experience
experience: Co-Founders of Catalyst Swarm, Eastern Townhall, Catalyst School. United in Catalyst Latam Community we come from diverse roles & realities
